```{r}
#Priscilla loading tidyverse and reading in kermit data

library(tidyverse)

kermit <- read_csv("kermit.csv")

```
```{r}
#Prisclla making side by side histograms of Score.pre separated by gender

kermit_hist <-kermit %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Score.pre)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 4) +
  facet_wrap(~Gender)

kermit_hist
```
